title: Charlie Bubbles to Fenway!
description: "Charlie Bubbles To Fenway" is a heartfelt and inspiring adventure as Charlie overcomes adversity by believing in himself, showing courage to stand up to bullies and dream big dreams.Â  This adventure features his old pals Paulie Pumpkin and Teddy Hiccup, Tai the Butterfly, and a trip to Fenway!
author: Paul Carafotes
